result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christian A Doss

defendant.name: Doss, Christian A
defendant.address: 517 Court St, Clark County Jail, Neillsville, WI 54456

records.addlTxt:
(Cases 21CF1195, 22CF191 are called at 9:05 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Christian A Doss appeared by video, in custody from Clark County Jail.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for Christian A Doss.  Attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives right to personal appearance. Defense recites the joint sentence recommendation. Victim/Witness statute complied with. Defendant is advised of charges, maximum penalties, elements of the crime(s) and constitutional rights. Defendant pleads No Contest to 21CF1195 Count 1- Possession of Methamphetamine. Court accepts plea and finds the Defendant guilty. Remaining charges are dismissed and read in, including 22CF191, 21TR9026.  
Court withholds sentence and orders 2 years Probation with the following conditions: 90 days jail, all stayed pending further order of the court; AODA and follow through with recommendations; Any conditions, programming or treatment per the agent and follow through with recommendations; Provide DNA sample and pay surcharge; Court costs. 
Court orders 3 days jail credit, if revoked. Court orders any contraband is destroyed.
Plea hearing on June 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Christian A Doss
Current: 517 Court St, Clark County Jail, Neillsville, WI 54456 United States  (Effective: 04-12-2022)
Prior: 300 Park St, Neillsville, WI 54456

(Cases 21CF1195, 22CF191 are called at 4:01 PM- by Zoom) Defendant Christian A Doss appeared by video, in custody from Clark County Jail.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for Christian A Doss.  Attorney Robert W. Stoiber in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives right to personal appearance. Defense acknowledges receipt of Information in 21CF1195, waives reading, and enters Not Guilty pleas on all counts in 21CF1195. 
22CF191- Defense waives reading of the Complaint. Defendant updates address. Court indicates a bond was previously ordered in 22CF191 and remains in effect. Time limits for preliminary hearing are waived in 22CF191. 
Defense indicates there is an offer, but needs time to review with Defendant. 
Status Conference/Plea Hearing to be scheduled with Branch 1 Judicial Assistant.

No contact with co defendant R.R. 
Defendant not to consume/use/possess any illegal drugs/non prescribed medications/controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.
Initial appearance on April 12, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Conditions
No contact with co-defendant R.R.
Defendant not to consume/use/possess any illegal drugs/non-prescribed medications/controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.

4:01 PM cases 21CF1195 and 22CF191 called and held via Zoom. Prosecuting attorney Robert W. Stoiber appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Christian A Doss appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Roger M Hillestad for Christian A Doss not in court. Defendant waives their right to appear in person and Court accepts waiver. 
Warrants are quashed. Defendant confirms address and phone number. Defendant advises they are on a Probation hold in Clark County. 
Defendant advised of the charges and bond is set in 22CF191. 
An initial appearance is scheduled in 22CF191 and a hearing is scheduled in 21CF1195 on 4/12/22 at 4:00 PM.

(Cases 21CF1195, 22CF191 are called at 1:41 PM) Defendant Christian A Doss not in court, Attorney Roger M Hillestad appeared in court for Christian A Doss, Attorney Robert W. Stoiber appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. State requests warrant. 
Warrant ordered.
